title: Infinite Bug Splat Loop Client Bug
body: I was about to start queue with my friend, when suddenly I got a bugsplat and my league crashed, my league restarted and I got more bugsplats, as im typing this message im still getting bugsplats, I when to task manager and I had to time it just write to close the client, I opened it back up and the same thing kept happening, their are currently about 20 bug splats on my screen and I have closed about 40 of them. This happened to my friend this morning and he uninstalled league and restarted his PC and it worked, I would try that but my computer is a kettle that im surprised can even run league and it took a long time to install, should I just reinstall overnight or is their a fix?

replies.body: Turn off your discord overlay (settings - overlay) and it fixes.
This indeed seems to fix it, thanks!
Fixed the issue for me as well. Thank you sir.

The issue seems to happen when discord is open as Baildroth posted earlier. I tested the theory and League client can launch normally without it, but as soon as discord connects, immediate bug splat loop. Not sure what the conflict is, but I feel that it's an issue regarding a recent update with Discord itself. :/
